name: PhotoRestorAI
description: Professional AI-powered photo restoration and enhancement suite. Restore vintage photos, enhance image quality, and bring your precious memories back to life using cutting-edge artificial intelligence. Features magic restoration, memorial photo care, creative editing, smart compositing, precision retouching, and professional adjustments. Mobile-optimized with intuitive floating controls. Developed by DHA.
prompt: PhotoRestorAI - Transform your old, damaged, or low-quality photos into stunning, high-resolution images with our comprehensive suite of AI-powered restoration tools. From gentle memorial photo restoration to creative artistic transformations.
